alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side; Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 18 at 10:43AM MST until June 18 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOST OF SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWEST ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Nevada...Fire weather zones 461, 462, 463, 464, 465, and 466. In Arizona...Fire weather zones 101 and 102. * WIND...Sustained winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. Stronger wind gusts possible across the Southern Great Basin. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 5 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not recommended. Heed all fire restrictions.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side; Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau
